elements.text:
As you're getting into the shower, you see a huge spider on the wall. You turn away for a second and look back and realize it's gone. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm nervous about the spider, but remind myself that it probably is more scared of me.
I'm grateful the spider is here to eat other bugs in my house.
I'm going to feel so refreshed after this shower.
I feel worried about where the spider may crawl next.
I feel freaked out, but know that I'm brave enough to take my shower anyway.
